name: Stand Of Arms
description:
Stand Of Arms Is a first-person shooter that combines classic shooter and low-poly style elements. The game can choose single combat, team combat, campaign and other modes, you need to have excellent marksmanship and skills to win. If you've played 'Ravenfield', don't miss it.

Single combat

There may be hidden enemies in every corner of the map. Find them and kill them. Be the first to complete the number of kills to win

Team Deathmatch

There is at least one faction in the map besides you. Find and kill them, and be the first to complete the number of kills to win

Campaign mode

There are multiple missions in the game, complete according to the requirements can win
